detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and appliqués at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
One-shoulder body in ribbed jersey with one narrow shoulder strap and press-studs at the crotch. Lined over the bust.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined at the top and with a short underskirt.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Suit set with a jacket and trousers woven in a viscose blend, a cotton shirt and a matching bow tie. Jacket with buttons at the front and fake front pockets. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, and fake side and back pockets. Shirt with buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Detachable, adjustable bow tie in satin with a plastic fastener at the back.
Patterned playsuit with narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with frill-trimmed elasticated hems.
Patterned playsuit with narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with frill-trimmed elasticated hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Fleece-lined, patterned wellingtons with removable fleece insoles, a loop at the back and chunky soles.
Fleece-lined, patterned wellingtons with removable fleece insoles, a loop at the back and chunky soles.
Leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop front and back, and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Leather ankle boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop front and back, and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Boots in patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with glittery elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. The polyester content of the boots is partly recycled.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with low heels, a loop at the back and a zip in one side with a star-shaped pull. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 3.5 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton shirt, tie and a pair of suit trousers in a soft cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a fastener at the back. Trousers with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and fake front pockets.
Top in supersoft pile with a wrapover, jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a gently rounded hem.
Top in supersoft pile with a wrapover, jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and a gently rounded hem.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a padded, rhinestone-covered foot strap, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a padded, rhinestone-covered foot strap, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Pool shoes in imitation leather with a padded, rhinestone-covered foot strap, moulded insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Jacket in sequined mesh with long sleeves. No fasteners. Jersey lining.
V-neck blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise around the neckline, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and gently gathered tiers to the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton containing some cashmere with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Braided, adjustable bracelets in various colours. Circumference 18-38 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey made from a viscose blend. Racer back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck and crossover straps with an open section at the back. Rounded hem. The polyester content of the vest top is partly recycled.

Headband in a soft, fine-knit cashmere blend with a knot detail at the front.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Glittery Alice band with an appliqué in the shape of a crown with beads at the top and spotted tulle fabric underneath. Lined with grosgrain fabric.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered detail at the top, long raglan sleeves and contrasting colour panels at the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin shawl lapels, a single button at the front, flap front pockets and a decorative chest pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Ankle-length boiler suit in washed organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs at the top and flap chest pockets. Detachable, adjustable belt at the waist, a button fly, long, gently flared sleeves and straight, wide legs with patch front pockets and back pockets.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets, an open back pocket, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
